channel.title: Recovering from Ban (Near Maxed Account)
channel.description:
Information
Hey MoparScapers,
So.. I got banned 2 months ago for botting. My account was almost maxed, and the total level was above 2,380. So I've decided to start over again, but on my other account that I haven't played on for a while. I'll be playing until I'm near maxed again, I'm not going to be botting because I don't want to be banned again and it isn't safe. I appreciate donations, and suppporters but if you don't wish to donate, or support that's your choice and it's all cool.
Here is a picture from the 7-4-2013; This was about 3 months before my ban. [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nqglxt.png[/img]
[b]Account[/b]
27/8/2013 [img]http://i.imgur.com/1A8ZvAZ.png[/img] Note: Total is low because I was F2P in this picture.
30/8/2013 [img]http://i.imgur.com/ul5ANb8.png[/img]
1/9/2013 [img]http://i.imgur.com/JlGvKCN.png[/img] This is my account account, I'll be posting updates ever 2-3 days.
[b]Supporters (0)[/b] - - -
[b]Donations (0)[/b] All donations are going towards Overloads & Turmoil so I really appreciate them. - -

item.title: Recovering from Ban (Near Maxed Account)
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:10, topic:529163”][quote author=Skyro link=topic=647920.msg4359595#msg4359595 date=1378423685]

This is why we don’t bot. Guess you had to learn the hard way. How often did you bot and for how long?

Yeah indeed haha. I played like 8-10 hours a day and just botted when I wasn’t online (which was only very little tbh).

But I honestly don’t care, I lost 1.2b and a near maxed account in the progress though.
[/quote]
This question, of course, will be a rough estimate, but what do you think you would of had by now if you didn’t bot? Like GP and level wise.[/quote]
I didn’t bot for GP, and I don’t see why it matters I don’t wanna bot, or talk about it anymore lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovering from Ban (Near Maxed Account)
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:9, topic:529163”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=647920.msg4359479#msg4359479 date=1378416635]
This is why we don’t bot. Guess you had to learn the hard way. How often did you bot and for how long?
[/quote]
Yeah indeed haha. I played like 8-10 hours a day and just botted when I wasn’t online (which was only very little tbh).

But I honestly don’t care, I lost 1.2b and a near maxed account in the progress though. :/[/quote]
This question, of course, will be a rough estimate, but what do you think you would of had by now if you didn’t bot? Like GP and level wise.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovering from Ban (Near Maxed Account)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

b00mz1029:

I’m confused on what people would be supporting and why they would ever donate. What would they get out of it?

Definition of donation: Something that is given to a charity, esp. a sum of money.

If you ask for something in return that selling/buying.

Read full topic

item.title: Recovering from Ban (Near Maxed Account)
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

rip4d:

Holy shit your farming got fudgeed.

Yup, and i was almost 99, infact i was lvl 98 farming.

And thanks guys.

@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

b00mz1029:

I’m confused on what people would be supporting and why they would ever donate. What would they get out of it?

People will actually donate quite a bit of GP. Especially if you’re a big RuneScape YouTuber trying to train skills that require a decent amount of money.
